00024 #ifndef DDD_MISC_HASHFUNC_HH
00025 #define DDD_MISC_HASHFUNC_HH
00026 
00027 /******************************************************************************/
00028 
00029 namespace ddd
00030 {
00034 
00039   inline size_t
00040   wang32_hash(size_t key)
00041   {
00042     // We assume that size_t has at least 32bits.
00043     key += ~(key << 15);
00044     key ^=  (key >> 10);
00045     key +=  (key << 3);
00046     key ^=  (key >> 6);
00047     key += ~(key << 11);
00048     key ^=  (key >> 16);
00049     return key;
00050   }
00051 
00058   inline size_t
00059   knuth32_hash(size_t key)
00060   {
00061     // 2654435761 is the golden ratio of 2^32.  The right shift of 3
00062     // bits assumes that all objects are aligned on a 8 byte boundary.
00063     return (key >> 3) * 2654435761U;
00064   }
00066 }
00067 
00068 #endif // DDD_MISC_HASHFUNC_HH
